info.title: Raw Substance - Read
info.description: This service contains data belonging to the raw substance header, such as creation date and header status, as well as other important information, for example material assignments, language-dependent and independent descriptions, estimated price, total solids, and density. You can also read a raw substance's standard composition, as well as diet, religious, GMO information.

x-sap-shortText: Read raw substance header data and composition using this asynchronous inbound service

values.text: Product Lifecycle Management - Recipe Development Integration(SAP_COM_0136)

tags.name: Specification Assigned Material For Key Date

Specification Value Assignment Instance with Composition

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_Product HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--

count.description: The number of entities in the collection. Available when using the [$inlinecount](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=67) query option.

innererror.description: The structure of this object is service-specific

top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items, see [Paging - Top](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=66)

skip.name: $skip
skip.description: Skip the first n items, see [Paging - Skip](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)
